profile.name: Star Citizen
profile.script:
function OnEvent(event, arg) if event == "M_PRESSED" and arg == xxx1 then OutputLCDMessage("FPS Mode") PressAndReleaseKey("I") Sleep(10) PressKey("Y") Sleep(250) ReleaseKey("Y") end
if event == "M_PRESSED" and arg == xxx2 then OutputLCDMessage("Flight Mode") PressAndReleaseKey("I") Sleep(10) PressAndReleaseKey("R") end
if event == "M_PRESSED" and arg == 1 then OutputLCDMessage("Player 1") PressAndReleaseKey("F4") Sleep(10) PressKey("Z") Sleep(100) PressKey("LALT") PressKey("LCTRL") Sleep(100) PressAndReleaseKey("1") Sleep(100) ReleaseKey("LALT") ReleaseKey("LCTRL") ReleaseKey("Z") PressKey("F") PressMouseButton("2") Sleep(100) ReleaseKey("F") ReleaseMouseButton("2") end
if event == "M_PRESSED" and arg == 2 then OutputLCDMessage("Player 2") PressAndReleaseKey("F4") Sleep(10) PressKey("Z") Sleep(100) PressKey("LALT") PressKey("LCTRL") Sleep(100) PressAndReleaseKey("2") Sleep(100) ReleaseKey("LALT") ReleaseKey("LCTRL") ReleaseKey("Z") PressKey("F") PressMouseButton("2") Sleep(100) ReleaseKey("F") ReleaseMouseButton("2") end
if event == "M_PRESSED" and arg == 3 then OutputLCDMessage("Player 3") PressAndReleaseKey("F4") Sleep(10) PressKey("Z") Sleep(100) PressKey("LALT") PressKey("LCTRL") Sleep(100) PressAndReleaseKey("3") Sleep(100) ReleaseKey("LALT") ReleaseKey("LCTRL") ReleaseKey("Z") PressKey("F") PressMouseButton("2") Sleep(100) ReleaseKey("F") ReleaseMouseButton("2") end end
